welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Granada, Colombia! Nestled in the heart of the Andes, this charming city is known for its colorful colonial architecture and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the beauty and magic of Granada. Enjoy your stay!"
